sentences.sContent: After the broadcast, we were inundated with requests for more information.
sentences.sCn: 节目播出之后，太多人来询问详情，令我们应接不暇。

synos.tran: 淹没；泛滥；浸水；（洪水般的）扑来

remMethod.val: in(进入) + und(波浪) + ate → 卷入波浪 → 淹没， 泛滥

trans.tranCn: 淹没， 泛滥； 使不胜负荷， 使应接不暇
trans.tranOther: to receive so much of something that you cannot easily deal with it all
